text:
I use JDK 1.3.1_07 and if I did use ANT 1.5.2 instead of 1.5.1 my EAR files 
wasn't working anymore. After some searching I did recognize that the specified 
application.xml wasn't included.
creator: olaf.braatz@t-online.de
bodewig@apache.org
text:
This is probably either a duplicate og bug 17648, bug 17780 or bug 17871.

Could you please replace ant.jar with the one from 
<http://cvs.apache.org/~bodewig/ant.jar> and close this bug if things work for
you?

Currentyl I'm under time pressure and therefore I can't test it. I will stay 
with version 1.5.1. I hope at the weekend I can test it at home. Thank you very 
much for your support! I will close that bug.
creator: olaf.braatz@t-online.de
